name: Bruce's Ultimate Journey
description:
The wonderful character design and animation (plus the sun) done by Anna Thomas!

This is a short little action-platformer where you play as Bruce. Bruce is on his ultimate journey to the gas station from his quaint trailer. Fighting skeletons and avoiding arrows is the only way to reach his destination. Join him and his trusty crossbow on the journey of a life time.

Use the left and right arrow keys to move

Use the up arrow to jump

Press space to fire arrows
